scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f umd -o dist/purify.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f es -o dist/purify.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f cjs -o dist/purify.cjs.js
scripts.test:karma: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup karma start test/karma.conf.js --log-level warn
scripts.test:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup npm run lint && npm run test:jsdom && npm run test:karma -- --log-level error --reporters dots --single-run --shouldTestOnBrowserStack="${TEST_BROWSERSTACK}" --shouldProbeOnly="${TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST}"
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test BABEL_ENV=rollup npm run lint &&  npm run test:jsdom && npm run test:karma -- --browsers Chrome
